recipes.title: Bread sandwich
recipes.method: Put one slice of bread between two other slices of bread. Delicious.

recipes.title: Mashed Potato
recipes.method: Boil them and mash them. Simple. Add cream if you want to get all fancy.

recipes.title: Smashed Chicken
recipes.method: Batter then fry the chicken and serve with rice. Smashing.

recipes.title: Bangers n Mash
recipes.method: Boil and mash the potato, cook the sausages, stick the sausages in the potato, pour gravy on. Nice.

recipes.title: Burger
recipes.method: Cook beef and put inside the bread.

recipes.title: Fish 'n' Chips
recipes.method:
1 - Batter and fry the fish
2 - slice the potato
3 - fry the potato
4 - put on a plate
5 - Salt 'n' Vinegar to taste

recipes.title: Peanut Butter Sandwich
recipes.method: Slap them in the sammich and stuff it in yer gob

recipes.title: Peanut Butter Sandwich
recipes.method: Slap them in the sammich and stuff it in yer gob

recipes.title: Cake
recipes.ingredients:
Eggs, Flour, Milk, Some other stuff maybe chocolate?
Perhaps?
recipes.method:
Mix it in a bowl,
Put it in the oven,
Serve. It is delicious!
